'''Jade Incense Cauldron''' is an exploration mechanic in [[Chenyu Vale]], [[Liyue]].

Interacting with a Jade Incense Cauldron will "pull" an orb of adeptal energy towards the player in a straight line. This energy will light any censers in its path. Interacting with the Cauldron again will "push" the adeptal energy back, which will again light any censers it passes through. Since censers will only remain lit temporarily, it is recommended to line them up so that the adeptal energy can hit multiple in one flight. Light all of the censers to complete the puzzle.
